name: Baseball career simulator!
description:
IT TAKES ABOUT A MINUTE TO LOAD

At the start move the player selection by using the arrow keys. 

Then use the number next to the player's name and put that into the question. 

Example: If you want to use a contact on the first-page type 1 and enter.

After each season click enter to move on to the next season. 

If you want to see your career stats wait 3 seconds after the offseason gains page and then it will pop up. 

For the player, cards write their name with a capital letter at the start. 

Example:

Ricky

Click R to retire.
